short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick links for all your anime and cartoon needs, from Naruto to Dragon Ball Kai. Make anime/cartoons easier with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension has been updated, which removed the specific anime and replaced them with more websites, more resources, and more streaming sites, as well as a few new sprites.

Access all your favorite anime/cartoons streaming sites, lists, and resources all in one window! Sites currently include...

AnimeFreak
KissAnime
KissCartoon
Proxer
crunchyroll
anime-planet
ANIME ON NETFLIX
Netflix

MyAnimeList
InkPad Notepad.


If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, fell free to email me at miachrome.rr@gmail.com and thank you for viewing my extension!
